object.name: Bolognese
object.description: desc ="with minced meat, vegetables and tomato sauce\r\n Ingredients: • Onions, garlic, carrots, celery • Minced meat • Tomato sauce • Basil, oregano, salt, pepper, thyme • oil"
object.sbs_description: heat saucepan, add oil, vegetables, thyme and salt 2. add minced meat and cook until browned all over 3. add tomato sauce and simmer 4. add some more spices
